metadata.title: CVE-2023-1192 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in smb2_is_status_io_timeout() in CIFS inthe Linux Kernel. After CIFS transfers response data to a system call,there are still local variable points to the memory region, and if thesystem call frees it faster than CIFS uses it, CIFS will access a freememory region, leading to a denial of service.
